pageContext.claim: “More women in the workforce today than ever before.  That's really terrific, and especially since it's on my watch. ”
pageContext.analysis: This claim lacks context. As the U.S. population increases, the number of people employed is bound to also increase, though there was actually a dip in the number of women employed from August through December. Moreover, during Trump's presidency, women have made up a smaller percentage of the overall workforce, dropping from 47 percent to 45 percent, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics.
